name: Beast
text: Multitasker — Response: After you draw an event or resource, put that card into your reserve → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.) “Oh, my stars and garters! What have we here?”

name: Hank McCoy
text: R&D — You may include up to 6 upgrades from aspects other than your chosen aspect. Your minimum deck size is 45 cards. Action: Put a card from your hand into your reserve. (Limit once per round.) “Flavour text.”

name: Beast
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust this card → heal 1 damage from your identity and 1 damage from Beast. “I'll set-up the device while you--”“--Run those calculations. Lets--” —Beast (Earth 616)“--Tag team a scientific solution.”

name: Addition by Subtraction
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats an enemy, repeat this attack. “The noblest answer unto such, is kindly silence when they brawl.” —Alfred Lord Tennyson

name: Lateral Thinking
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you played this card from your hand, put this card into your reserve. “Perhaps a new perspective will present a possible resolution for this perplexing problem.” —Beast

name: Logical Solution
text: Action: Choose an attachment with the text “Alter-Ego Action” or “Hero Action”. Discard that attachment. “Oftentimes, concocting a feasible countermeasure to the opponent's paraphernalia is a trying and complex process. However, in this instance brute force will suffice.” —Beast

name: Spring into Action
text: Hero Action: Ready your hero. “We few, we happy few, we band of brothers; For he who sheds his blood with me this day shall be my brother; be he ne'er so vile, this day shall gentle his condition; And men in England now abed, will count their manhoods cheap, they were not here with us to fight on Crispin's day!” —William Shakespeare, Henry V

name: Beast's Lab
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Beast's Lab → choose a player. That player searches their deck and discard pile for an upgrade and plays it (paying its resource cost). “This is absolutely fascinating on every conceivable level.” —Beast

name: Keen Mind
text: Increase your reserve limit by 1. Resource: Exhaust Keen Mind → generate a [mental] resource (generate a [wild] resource instead if paying for a card in your reserve). ”As Archimedes said when he discovered the principle of displacement; Eureka!” —Beast

name: Prehensile Feet
text: You can control 1 additional upgrade that has the restricted keyword. Action: Exhaust Prehensile Feet → put a card from your reserve into your hand. “My prodigious pedal extremities have things in hand... or foot, to be more accurate.” —Beast

name: Scientific Solution
text: Response: After you draw an event or resource, put that card into your reserve → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.) “To answer the age-old question of whether one would rather serve in righteous heaven or rule in pragmatic hell, I'm forced to say, Dr. McCoy, you might just be the devil.” —Beast

name: Secondary Mutations
text: You get +4 hit points. Hank McCoy gets +1 REC. Beast gets +1 ATK, and +1 DEF. “According to your records you genetically tampered with our own mutation years ago...” —Beast (Earth-TRN240)
